Package edu.kit.kastel.mcse.ardoco.core.common.util.wordsim

Class WordSimUtils

java.lang.Object
edu.kit.kastel.mcse.ardoco.core.common.util.wordsim.WordSimUtils
public class WordSimUtils extends Object
A static class that provides various utility methods to calculate similarity between different kinds of objects. This class statically keeps a reference to a fallback ComparisonStrategy and a fallback list of word similarity measures. These fallbacks can be changed with the setMeasures(Collection) and setStrategy(ComparisonStrategy) methods. Any calls to methods that provide their own measures or strategies will not utilize these fallbacks. Any calls that do not provide their own measures or strategies will utilize them. As of right now, no protections against simultaneous write access from multiple threads exist. Therefore, this class is not threadsafe.

  • Method Details

    • setMeasures

      public static void setMeasures(Collection<WordSimMeasure> measures)
      Sets which measures should be used for similarity comparison. The specified collection of measures will be used for all subsequent comparisons.
      Parameters:
      measures - the measures to use

    • setStrategy

      public static void setStrategy(ComparisonStrategy strategy)
      Sets the default comparison strategy. The specified strategy will be used for all subsequent comparisons that themselves do not specify a strategy.
      Parameters:
      strategy - the new default strategy

    • areWordsSimilar

      public static boolean areWordsSimilar(ComparisonContext ctx, ComparisonStrategy strategy)
      Evaluates whether the words from the given ComparisonContext are similar using the specified comparison strategy.
      Parameters:
      ctx - the context
      strategy - the strategy
      Returns:
      Returns true if the given strategy considers the words similar enough.

    • areWordsSimilar

      public static boolean areWordsSimilar(ComparisonContext ctx)
      Evaluates whether the words from the given ComparisonContext are similar using the default comparison strategy. The default strategy can be changed with the setStrategy(ComparisonStrategy) method.
      Parameters:
      ctx - the context
      Returns:
      Returns true if the default strategy considers the words similar enough.

    • areWordsSimilar

      Parameters:
      firstWord - the first word
      secondWord - the second word
      Returns:
      Returns true if the default strategy considers the words similar enough.
